sub_title: Lead Designer at Media Support Center, Erasmus University Rotterdam
summary:
I am a creative media professional with excellent understanding of marketing, design and innovation. I have more than 15 years of marketing and design experience with top-tier international firms. Already for the past 8 years, I have had the honour to move education forward with the brightest minds and most fun people at the Erasmus University Rotterdam.

Johan in a few words:
Media Creative | Everything Digital | Blockchain & Tech Enthusiast | Communities | Sports Fanatic | Yogi

Areas of interests:
Corporate Branding, Sustainability, Education, Contemporary Art & Culture, Sports, and Blockchain.

Mobile: +31 (0)6 20 110 389

Feel free to contact me! I'd be happy to share a thought over coffee!!

school.name: University of International Business and Economics

awards.title: Winner of the Smart Rotterdam Challenge
awards.description: The Smart Rotterdam Challenge is an online platform through which we discovered applications of the Internet of Things in Rotterdam to improve the quality of life. With my idea on a 'Street Food 2.0 Community' I won the competition, which gives me access to business coaching, office space, network access and an investment in product development.

profile_positions.description: Part of the founding team of the first center for entrepreneurship at Science Park Amsterdam - Science Park Amsterdam Center for Entrepreneurship (SPACE), establishing cooperation with the U of Amsterdam Science Faculty and research institutes. Later merged with the Amsterdam Centre for Entrepreneurship (ACE), to become ACE @ Science Park.

volunteer_experiences.description: Rotterdam kan een veel prettiger woonomgeving worden voor mens en dier, een stad waarin we kunnen werken aan een groenere samenleving waarin alle inwoners zich thuis kunnen voelen. Help je mee het tij te keren en samen in Rotterdam de wereld te verbeteren?

company.name: Partij voor de Dieren Schieland en de Krimpenerwaard

volunteer_experiences.description: Stem Partij voor de Dieren in het waterschap, zodat wij ons sterk kunnen maken voor dieren, natuur en milieu in Hoogheemraadschap van Schieland en de Krimpenerwaard.

Tot de Verbeelding wil de verbeelding aanspreken en de wereld tonen zoals je hem niet vaak ziet. Of misschien wel nooit hebt gezien. Wij worden gefascineerd door het vertellen van verhalen, we geven een draai aan een bekende wereld waardoor je hem net even anders gaat zien. We willen de wereld een tikje mooier maken, een meerlagigheid aanbrengen, het gevoel creëren dat er achter elke dichte deur een onverwachte andere wereld kan zitten.
Evolv Weekend, which brings Lean Startup to the next level in an evolving weekend for entrepreneurs. Current editions: Rotterdam, Antwerp, Middlesbrough, Newcastle, Venlo and Amsterdam - www.evolv.es

TEDxAmsterdam is organised by a nonprofit foundation driven by volunteers and financially supported by sponsors from the corporate world. The main goal of the foundation is to organise several annual TEDxAmsterdam events and create a movement around ‘ideas worth doing’.

The Marketing Association Amsterdam is a career association for third year bachelor, premaster and master students from the University of Amsterdam (UvA) and the Vrije Universiteit (VU). We connect students, companies and faculties that have a mutual interest in Marketing, Consultancy, Entrepreneurship or Communication.
